name: EU-CORD
goal:
EU-CORD is a network of European Christian Relief and Development NGOs. We are made up of member organisations – 24 NGOs that work alongside over 1,000 implementing partners worldwide.

Our Vision

Christian organisations collaborating for a transformed, just, and equal world

Our Goal

Through mutual cooperation, to make a significant and recognisable contribution towards humanitarian action, sustainable development, peaceful communities and global justice
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum
euInitiatives:
Policy relating to international development and humanitarian action

Sustainable Development Goals, Humanitarian Consensus, Comprehensive Approach, Policy Coherence for Development, disability inclusive humanitarian and development policy and action.
